<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> BUSINESS AVIATION NEWSLETTER April 2019 VOTE FOR US IN THE 2019 AIN SURVEY Every year, Aviation International News (AIN) conducts a Product Support Survey where they ask their readers to evaluate aircraft, engines and avionics products with which they have had experience during the prior twelve months. The survey is released during the month of May.
As an engines and avionics manufacturer, Honeywell takes this and other industry surveys seriously. All the results are reviewed by our leadership and we use the information to improve our products, services and support. Our goal is to achieve top marks in the surveys and we need your feedback to make this happen. If you’re subscribed to AIN, please watch for and complete the 2019 survey.
